reviews.text: Excellent food.  Great ambiance and flow.  Service was great for more than 15 people.  Everyone had a great and pleasant evening.  Will come back.

Came here for brunch for the first time! Service was prompt and I really liked the ambiance of the dining area. 

The food was amazing. Portion sizes were...
Since my first review, I've been to Wolf's Ridge 4 or 5 times.  The food is always top-notch, the beer is always very good, and the people are always great....
